overview: In my opinion, Ravi Shankarâ€™s genius and humanity can only be compared to that of Mozart' - declares Sir Yehudi Menuhin, the famous English violinist, describing this musician, composer and popular hero who reveals Indian music to the entire world. Indian ragas uncontested ambassador, Ravi Shankar wove friendly connections with artists and performers all over the globe.
title: Pundit Ravi Shankar
